data.name: Login_UnfoundDomain
data.value: Could not sign in because the specified domain is not available. Please make sure the RAWeb server is connected to your domain's network and try again.

data.name: Login_LocalMachineError
data.value: Something went wrong while validating credentials against the local machine. Please try again later.

data.name: Login_AccountRestrictionError
data.value: There are restrictions on your account that are preventing you from signing in.

data.name: Login_InvalidLogonHoursError
data.value: Your account has time restrictions that keep you from signing in right now.

data.name: Login_InvalidWorkstationError
data.value: You are not allowed to sign in to this server.

data.name: Login_PasswordExpiredError
data.value: The password for this account has expired. {password_change_button}

data.name: Login_PasswordMustChange
data.value: You must change your password before you can sign in. {password_change_button}
